abstract: On Saturday, a place to find rare concert art, in San Francisco.
snippet: On Saturday, a place to find rare concert art, in San Francisco.
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, visitors to the Rock Poster Society's 13th annual Festival of Rock Posters in San Francisco will need to take a number to get any face time with a soft-spoken artist named Emek, whose psychedelic-steampunk screenprints are some of the hottest pieces of paper in the rock poster world.

headline.main: Where Hard Rock Meets Pop Art
